sn3.1:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn3.1:1.3: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn3.1:1.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn3.1:1.5: “bhavampi no gotamo anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti paṭijānātī”ti?
sn3.1:1.6: “Yañhi taṃ, mahārāja, sammā vadamāno vadeyya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti, mameva taṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
sn3.1:2.1: “Yepi te, bho gotama, samaṇabrāhmaṇā saṅghino gaṇino gaṇācariyā ñātā yasassino titthakarā sādhusammatā bahujanassa, seyyathidaṃ—
sn3.1:2.2: pūraṇo kassapo, makkhali gosālo, nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto, sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto, pakudho kaccāyano, ajito kesakambalo;
sn3.1:2.3: tepi mayā ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti paṭijānāthā’ti puṭṭhā samānā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti na paṭijānanti.
sn3.1:2.4: Kiṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo daharo ceva jātiyā navo ca pabbajjāyā”ti?
sn3.1:3.1: “Cattāro kho me, mahārāja, daharāti na uññātabbā, daharāti na paribhotabbā.
sn3.1:3.3: Khattiyo kho, mahārāja, daharoti na uññātabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:3.4: Urago kho, mahārāja, daharoti na uññātabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:3.5: Aggi kho, mahārāja, daharoti na uññātabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:3.6: Bhikkhu, kho, mahārāja, daharoti na uññātabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:3.7: Ime kho, mahārāja, cattāro daharāti na uññātabbā, daharāti na paribhotabbā”ti.
sn3.1:4.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
sn3.1:14.1: Evaṃ vutte, rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn3.1:14.3: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti; evamevaṃ bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn3.1:14.4: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca.
sn3.1:14.5: Upāsakaṃ maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
